string.text: Who are you... And what the fuck are you doing here?!
Searching for treasures, have you found any?
No, I haven't "found any". Is this some sort of a fucking joke? You gotta hear the growls coming from down there first, then you can think about treasures.
Exploration. You never know what you can find here.
Out of all places you could explore in the Zone, you ended up here... Cute.
I'm on a mission.
Uh, I see... You must be unlucky to end up here. We're in the same boat.
So what about you? How did you guys end up here?

Name's Reefer. Me and the boys arrived here a couple of days ago, all thanks to Sultan. "It's okay boys, that place was abandoned long time ago", "There's nothing to be scared of". Abandoned my ass... We almost got ourselves killed last night when those angry things showed up out of nowhere. We retreated back here, and haven't moved since then. \nWe're supposed to search for anything useful lying around the place. According to rumours, Strelok had a hideout somewhere here where he kept his stuff around. Why Sultan cares so much? I don't really know. He said he will feed us to pseudodogs if we don't bring anything useful.
Sounds like a bad situation. Maybe I can help?
You will? Well... I can use an extra hand, but it's too damn risky, man.
We will see, how about we search together?
Shit... I don't know, man... I don't want to see those damn things ever again... \n...
...Fuck this... I can't come back empty-handed anyway. Let's do this.
Let's go.
I will take a look around. If I find anything, I'll let you know.
You're crazy, you know that? Good luck with your search.
I see, good luck in your search.
Are you talking about these documents?
Here, I found this briefcase.
What the... For real?!
Don't overthink it. Here, take a look.
Unfortunately, this briefcase will stay with me.
Are... Are you sure about this?
Yep.
Just kiddin', you can have them.
I don't have time for your crap man.

Man, I don't know what to say, honestly. We can finally leave this shithole. I'm going back to Sultan with these documents, the boys here will stay for a little while once we arrange everything. \nWhat about you? Wanna come with me? I'll make sure Sultan pays you generously.
I have other business to do, see you around.
Eh, before you go... Here, take this. I found it in one of those glowing anomalies when we were exploring the place. Consider it a reward for your help. Maybe you can make good use of it.
Alright man, thanks.
Sure, let's go.
Okay, I can help your boys in the search.
Here we go.
Thanks buddy, I won't forget your help. Here, take this. I... eh... found this shiny artefact when we were exploring earlier. Consider it payment for your troubles.
Thanks. What are you gonna do now?
I will take this briefcase to Sultan and let him know what went down. I'm just glad it's over. If I see you again, feel free to buy me a drink. I think we could both use a few after this shit.
Alright, take care.
Alright boys, me and our friend here are going down the tunnels. You stay here and guard the place.
Be careful man.
Underground expedition

Reefer needs help finding documents inside Agroprom Underground, whether they're original institute research papers, or the notes of famous stalkers such as Strelok. Search every nook and cranny for valuable information.
Return with your finding to Reefer.
Escort Reefer to the Bandits' base in Dark Valley.
Talk to Reefer.
